ch2: From the camp to the historical park

0.alt: The Geoje camp is built by prisoners of war.
0.title: Construction

1.alt: Disembarked on the island, the prisoners are taken to the camp.
1.title: Arrival at the Camp

2.alt: Administered by the American army, South Korean soldiers help their allies to manage the prisoners.
2.title: Militarization of the Site

3.alt: Following the Geneva Conventions, the Red Cross regularly visits the camp to verify that the living conditions of the detainees comply with the commitments made by the American army.
3.title: After Geneva

4.alt: Separated into numerous barracks which are themselves separated into various zones, the prisoners are grouped by political and ideological affinities.
4.title: Ideological Separations

5.alt: Within the camp, numerous sports and cultural activities are organized to entertain the prisoners.
5.title: A Place of Community

6.alt: In order to fight against the communist enemy, the Americans conduct ideological re-education courses for the prisoners.
6.title: A Place of Propaganda

7.alt: Ideologically opposed, many communist prisoners overthrew the camp's administration and captured General Dodd.
7.title: The Rebels

8.alt: The military quelling the revolt within the camp.
8.title: A Place of Control
